title: Tornado Damage in Moore, Oklahoma
description: On May 3, 2003, a group of intense supercell thunderstorms spawned multiple tornados that swept across Oklahoma and nearby states. One of the tornados touched down in the town of Moore, just south of Oklahoma City.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
